sources.title: After The Cut (1946)
sources.description: MN4353i Navy // A Navy training video for pilots regarding aircraft carrier landings.

metadata.Plot: On an aircraft carrier, yet another fighter plane is damaged in a botched landing. Down below, that plane finds he has a lot of company with numerous planes that all need repair because of pilots who disobey basic landing safety rules. Together, they discuss the various errors that can lead to damaged planes, ships and lost crew while they dream for pilots able to land properly.
